issue.title: pcgamingwiki.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

-

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

`https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Grand_Theft_Auto_V`

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Some links in the `Availability` section have tracking parameters:
`https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Grand_Theft_Auto_V#Availability`

```adb
! https://epicgames.com/p/grand-theft-auto-v?epic_affiliate=pcgamingwiki
! https://gamersgate.com/product/grand-theft-auto-v-premium-edition?caff=5418682
! https://humblebundle.com/store/grand-theft-auto-v-premium-edition?partner=pcgw
||epicgames.com^$removeparam=epic_affiliate
||gamersgate.com^$removeparam=caff
||humblebundle.com^$removeparam=partner
```

The list already contains some filters for `humblebundle.com`.


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: @MasterKia That parameters on this site used for marketing - when someone buys using that links, he get a percent of the finished order.

issue.title: Google Feed Missed ads
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0.910

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Google Feed on far left screen

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. If I refresh filters and then refresh my Google feed it will get most ads, but some game ads still show up.  There needs to be both an increase in refreshing filters and a way to not miss some of those ads. 

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

> The element .focus in the home page of this website (https://www.right.com.cn/forum/) has been hidden

Is it the same popup?

Btw, you can add this rule to User rules `right.com.cn##.focus`.
Thanks for your participation.

labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

-

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

`https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Grand_Theft_Auto_V`

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Some links in the `Availability` section have tracking parameters:
`https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Grand_Theft_Auto_V#Availability`

```adb
! https://epicgames.com/p/grand-theft-auto-v?epic_affiliate=pcgamingwiki
! https://gamersgate.com/product/grand-theft-auto-v-premium-edition?caff=5418682
! https://humblebundle.com/store/grand-theft-auto-v-premium-edition?partner=pcgw
||epicgames.com^$removeparam=epic_affiliate
||gamersgate.com^$removeparam=caff
||humblebundle.com^$removeparam=partner
```

The list already contains some filters for `humblebundle.com`.


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> double standard

Why? Removing of that parameters does not break links to discounts as I know.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

comment.body:
It's caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`, so please disable that filter list or add this rule:
```adblock
bing.com#@$##b_tq_header, .header, .sbox { position: absolute !important; }
```
to the use rules.
